activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13813
activity.text:
I've created a PR to address this issue: #13939

Implemented a custom TableSkeleton component that shows a preview of the table structure during loading, providing better UX than the generic loading spinner.

Changes include:
- Created reusable TableSkeleton component with shadcn/ui
- Replaced Loading spinner in PatientIndex
- Ensured uniform skeleton dimensions for professional appearance
- Added both before/after screen recordings for demonstration

PR Link: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/13939

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13939
activity.text: ✨ Replace Loading component with TableSkeleton in patient search

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13813
activity.text: Hi! I'd like to work on this issue. I'll create a custom TableSkeleton component to replace the Loading component in the patient search bar.
